Detailed Description

Ordered list implementations.

Any implementation of ordered list in CDS library is derived from class ordered_list_tag. It means that 

                boost::type_traits::is_base_of< cds::ordered_list::ordered_list_tag, L>::value

is true iff L is an implementation of ordered list

Usually, the ordered list is used as a container to resolve collisions in various hash map implementations. Keys in ordered list are stored in sorted order.

The common interface of ordered list implementation see Ordered list common interface.

cds 0.7.0 Developed by Maxim Khiszinsky aka khizmax 2007 - 2010
